Newton Developer Technical Information: Newton Programmer's Guide: 2.1 OS Addendum /
Chapter 7 - Sound / Sound Reference
Protos

protoRecorderView

The *protoRecorderView system prototype implements a simple set of user interface controls for recording and playback of sounds. This proto is shown in Figure 7-3.

Slot descriptions

elapsedTime
An integer giving the number of seconds used in recording.
statusText
Set to nil by default. If you wish to catch recorder view state changes, you can implement a *SetState function in a frame in this slot. See the *SetState method later in this section for more information.
The following methods are used with *protoRecorderView.
